title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 302.16 - Recordkeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 302.16 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations

The administrator shall keep all records pertaining to each arbitration for a
period of at least two years and shall make the records of a particular arbitration available for inspection upon written request by a party to that
arbitration, and shall make records of all arbitrations available to the Attorney General upon written request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
302.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
